message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $11,000. How about we try $11,000?
